feed.title: Combined summary - Hello every ones ! A message from an unknown traveller.

entry.title: Combined summary - Hello every ones ! A message from an unknown traveller.
entry.summary: On November 15th, 2017, Matt Corallo responded to a previous email from Satoshi Nakamoto about "keeping Bitcoin weird" on the Lightning development mailing list. Nakamoto's email on November 14th, 2017, encouraged individuals to stay optimistic and plan ahead with strategic capacity while being kind in the face of negative criticism. The context of the conversation appears to relate to cryptocurrency development, specifically the development of Bitcoin's Lightning Network. However, Nakamoto also added a humorous touch by mentioning hair color-related hard forks lacking consensus. The use of quirky language like "keep Bitcoin weird" suggests that the community values individuality and creativity in their approach to development.
